summary: Dramaan is the most popular man in Colobane, but when a woman from his past, now exorbitantly wealthy, returns to the town, things begin to change.
cast: Mansour Diouf|Ami Diakhate|Faly Gueye|Mamadou Mahourédia Gueye|Omar Ba|Issa Samb|Calgou Fall|Kaoru Egushi|Djibril Diop Mambéty|Mbaba Diop|Abdoulaye Diop|Rama Thiaw|Oumi Samb|Tcheley Hanny
title: Hyènes
